questions.question: Hi, how are you?
questions.answer: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you. How can I assist you today?

questions.question: What's your favorite color?
questions.answer: I don't have a favorite color, but I'm here to help with any questions you have.

questions.question: Tell me about yourself.
questions.answer: I'm just a chatbot designed to answer questions and have conversations. Feel free to ask me anything!

questions.question: Do you have any hobbies?
questions.answer: I don't have hobbies like humans do, but I enjoy helping users and providing information.

questions.question: Where are you from?
questions.answer: I don't have a specific place of origin. I exist in the digital realm to assist you.

questions.question: What's the time?
questions.answer: I don't have real-time capabilities, so I can't provide the current time. Please check your device's clock.

questions.question: Can you tell me a riddle?
questions.answer: Of course! Here's one: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I? (Answer: An echo)

questions.question: What's your favorite food?
questions.answer: I don't eat, so I don't have a favorite food. How can I assist you today?
